name: THIRD_PARTY_PRICING
description: This table stores third party pricing records.

columns.name: RUL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the third-party pricing entity, grouper, or rule.

columns.name: RUL_ID_RUL_NAME
columns.description: The name of the third-party pricing entity, grouper, or rule.

columns.name: RUL_NAME
columns.description: The name of the third-party pricing entity, grouper, or rule.
